name: Murder Motives
description:
Online Sleuths at home figure out WHO DONE IT? ...And.. WHAT’S THEIR MOTIVE? By listening to wacky Eye Witness reports ranging from BIGFOOT BEING DISMEMBERED BY A CHAINSAW IN A GREEK TEMPLE …. Or…. ELLEN DEGENERES STABBED IN A SOUTHWEST PLANE BATHROOM

 ….Anything can happen when there’s a Murder and  Motives...
